thread.title: SamMobile Daily Recap: February 21, 2017 — Galaxy S8 on-screen button, Galaxy Note 7 to relaunch and more!
thread.title_full: SamMobile Daily Recap: February 21, 2017 — Galaxy S8 on-screen button, Galaxy Note 7 to relaunch and more!

author: Josh L.
title: SamMobile Daily Recap: February 21, 2017 — Galaxy S8 on-screen button, Galaxy Note 7 to relaunch and more!
text: Josh L. / 6 hours ago We publish a lot of stories on a daily basis. Unfortunately, the majority of news breaks during our European hours of operation, which makes it difficult for our readers in the US (and other regions) to keep up with every post. But, we think we’ve come up with an ideal solution — a daily recap . In the list below, you’ll find the stories that went live today. We understand that you’re not going to be interested in all of them, so we’ve split them into their respective categories. If you want to see the latest Galaxy Note 7 news, simply locate the Phones subheading. Business
